To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Sum _sum;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_sum = SUM(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_sum.IsReady)
{
    var period = _sum.Period.Value;
    var current = _sum.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.sum = self.SUM(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.sum.IsReady:
    period = self.sum.Period.Value
    current = self.sum.Current.Value
